---
title: ".flipt.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML file defines the configuration for a Flipt evaluation engine, instructing it to include an additional configuration file named "alternative.yml". This suggests a setup where different configuration environments or scenarios are managed through separate files.

## Symbols
There are no symbols (functions, classes, methods) in this code as it is a YAML configuration file.

## Dependencies
This configuration file implies a dependency on the Flipt evaluation engine as it adheres to its configuration format.

### Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| version | string |  | Specifies the version of the Flipt configuration format being used. |
| include | list |  |  A list of YAML files to include in the configuration. This allows for modular configuration and separating different environments or scenarios. | 

## Error Handling
Error handling is not explicitly defined within this configuration file. It is assumed that the Flipt engine handles errors related to parsing the configuration or loading included files.
